trans-unit.source: Defines the lock that implements single-writer/multiple-reader semantics.
trans-unit.target: 定义实现单个编写器/多个阅读器语义的锁。

trans-unit.source: This is a value type.
trans-unit.target: 这是值类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to request a reader lock, upgrade the reader lock to a writer lock, and save the <xref:System.Threading.LockCookie>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何请求读线程锁，将读取器锁升级为写线程锁，并将保存<xref:System.Threading.LockCookie>。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:System.Threading.LockCookie> to downgrade to a reader lock again.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用<xref:System.Threading.LockCookie>再次降级到将读线程锁。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock>类。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指示当前实例是否等于指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前类型进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" /> and is equal to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 指示指定的对象是否为 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" /> 并且等于当前实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value of <paramref name="obj" /> is equal to the value of the current instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 的值等于当前实例的值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" /> to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前实例进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" />.
trans-unit.target: 指示当前实例是否等于指定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is equal to the value of the current instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 等于当前实例的值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" /> to compare to <c>b</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>b</c> 进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" /> to compare to <c>a</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>a</c> 进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" /> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 指示两个 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" /> 结构是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="a" /> is equal to <paramref name="b" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 等于 <paramref name="a" />，则为 <paramref name="b" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Threading.LockCookie.Equals%28System.Threading.LockCookie%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是<xref:System.Threading.LockCookie.Equals%28System.Threading.LockCookie%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" /> to compare to <c>b</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>b</c> 进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" /> to compare to <c>a</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>a</c> 进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" /> structures are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 指示两个 <see cref="T:System.Threading.LockCookie" /> 结构是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="a" /> is not equal to <paramref name="b" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 不等于 <paramref name="a" />，则为 <paramref name="b" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Threading.LockCookie.Equals%28System.Threading.LockCookie%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是<xref:System.Threading.LockCookie.Equals%28System.Threading.LockCookie%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
